service.agent

Class AgentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.ServiceRequester
      • service.agent.AgentHandler

  • public class AgentHandler
extends ServiceRequester
    Sends requests to api.ai agent via its http api
    Author:
    Jasmin Wellnitz
